original_text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your sons cast them out? therefore shall they be your judges.
korean_text: 내가 바알세불을 힘입어 귀신을 쫓아내면 너희 아들들은 누구를 힘입어 쫓아내느냐 그러므로 그들이 너희 재판관이 되리라

sentences.original_text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils
by whom do your sons cast them out?
therefore shall they be your judges.
